title: Sugar Beats Love in Skittles' Super Bowl Commercial | Mojo in the Morning | Channel 955
text:
Sugar Beats Love in Skittles' Super Bowl Commercial posted by Joey - share 
The best part of the Super Bowl is the commercials. Skittles find romance losing out to sugary goodness, as a teen throws Skittles at his belovedâ€™s window trying to get her attention. He didn't know what was going on in the inside of the room. Her and a few others are catching Skittles in their mouths and ignoring him altogether. Even grandma gets in on the action. Wake up with us every morning starting at 5am on Detroit's #1 Hit Music Station, Channel 955! Contact
